title: Megadose vitamin C in treatment of the common cold: a randomised controlled trial
author: Vitetta; Luis; Sali; Avni; Paspaliaris; Bill; Reavley; Nicola J
description: Megadose vitamin C in treatment of the common cold: a randomised controlled trial
cleaned_text: To the Editor: There is much conflicting evidence that increased intake of vitamin C enhances the natural protective mechanisms of the body and decreases both the incidence and severity of the common cold.
